This provision establishes the full legal responsibility and rights that you have when you use Hybrid Video products, software, services, and related sites (collectively the "Service"). In this clause, "you" means any individual who accesses and uses the Service. Hybrid Video Envision Video Platform will capture user page behavior trajectories (such as user page browsing history, user login and logout records, and content viewing records). The data will be applied in refined video user operations support; that is, the system will analyze user preferences based on the user page behavior trajectories; with the user preferences, the system will perform personalized recommendation when users browse content recommendation slots and search for content. In this way, users can quickly find preferred content, and user experience is enhanced. Please read the following terms carefully and click "agree" to show that you have read and accept these terms.
